channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: eded264d-1796-4e25-8500-a78427f8a316
Display name: Azure Data Transfer Owner
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete pipelines, connections, and flows in Azure Data Transfer. Also perform any appropriate control plane operations for managing Azure Data Transfer resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/eded264d-1796-4e25-8500-a78427f8a316?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: f4eb044f-76b9-47af-92f9-1d95c4c14ab5
Display name: Azure Business Continuity DUPI Reader
Description: Lets you view Deleted Unified Protected items in Azure Business Continuity Center.
Link: https://management.azure.com/f4eb044f-76b9-47af-92f9-1d95c4c14ab5?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: bf41e52e-617f-4981-8b7a-47431bd4e011
Display name: CosmosDB Fleet Analytics Storage Data Writer service role
Description: Write telemetry data from the Fleet Analytics Synapse workspace to customer-provided storage accounts or Fabric Lakehouses.
Link: https://management.azure.com/bf41e52e-617f-4981-8b7a-47431bd4e011?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 3f99eaab-6f59-4877-adf5-1cacd22e20b0
Display name: Video Indexer Account Contributor
Description: Can manage Video Indexer Account resources and generate access tokens for data plane operations.
Link: https://management.azure.com/3f99eaab-6f59-4877-adf5-1cacd22e20b0?api-version=2022-04-01
